body_html: This seems problematic because of SpasrseTensorImpls that are also variables. i.e. using sizes_ directly in SparseTensorImpl is problematic because you actually want to be modifying data's sizes_; but this means we need to provide mutable calls at the TensorImpl level.
body_text: This seems problematic because of SpasrseTensorImpls that are also variables.  i.e. using sizes_ directly in SparseTensorImpl is problematic because you actually want to be modifying data's sizes_; but this means we need to provide mutable calls at the TensorImpl level.
body: This seems problematic because of SpasrseTensorImpls that are also variables.  i.e. using sizes_ directly in SparseTensorImpl is problematic because you actually want to be modifying data's sizes_; but this means we need to provide mutable calls at the TensorImpl level.
